title: Password Generator
whatsnew:
• 🚀 Initial release of the Password Generator tool

  • 🔢 Add custom options: password length, character types, and exclusions

  • 📱 Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop

  • 📋 One-click copy feature for convenience

  • 🛡️ Improved algorithm for enhanced randomness and entropy
longDescription:
Password Generator by dhimanp is a fast, secure, and easy-to-use tool designed to help you create strong, random passwords instantly. Whether you're setting up a new account or updating credentials, this app ensures your passwords are both complex and unguessable—maximizing your digital security.

With customizable options for length, character types (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, symbols), and exclusions, it adapts to your security policies while staying user-friendly. No login or installation required—generate and copy your passwords with just a click.

🔑 Key Features:

  • 🧠 Generate strong, random passwords instantly

  • ⚙️ Fully customizable: choose length, characters, and complexity

  • 📋 One-click copy to clipboard feature

  • 🔐 No data stored — everything runs locally in your browser

  • 📱 Lightweight and mobile-friendly UI

  • 🌐 Works on all modern browsers and devices

Protect your accounts with military-grade password randomness — all from the comfort of your browser.
